line_items.label: Pro Forma Annual Debt Service (from input above)
CFL:  (Lease Adj Funded Debt minus cash)/(EBITDAR)
Pro Forma Total Liab/TNW (Balance Sheet Leverage)
Pro Forma CFL:  (Lease Adj Funded Debt minus cash)/(EBITDAR)
Pro Forma DSC (Existing DS + Pro Forma DS)
Pro Forma FCC (Existing DS + Pro Forma DS)
EBITDA
line_items.formula: =(depreciation_expense + amortization_expense + income_tax_expense + net_profit + interest_expense_minus + cost_of_sales_depreciation - gain_or_loss_on_asset_sale)
